Sentence: Rashḥ-i-‘Amá (The Clouds of the Realms Above)
Text: Rashḥ-i-‘Amá (The Clouds of the Realms Above)

Sentence: ’Tis from Our anthem that the mysteries of faith are raining down
Text: ’Tis from Our anthem that the mysteries of faith are raining down.

Sentence: This sweetly scented breeze from Our curling locks is raining down
Text: This sweetly scented breeze from Our curling locks is raining down.

Sentence: Behold that mystic truth which from His Countenance is raining down
Text: Behold that mystic truth which from His Countenance is raining down.

Sentence: This precious, rare bestowal from Our rapture is raining down
Text: This precious, rare bestowal from Our rapture is raining down.

Sentence: From out this treasure trove the pearls of faithfulness are raining down
Text: From out this treasure trove the pearls of faithfulness are raining down.

Sentence: This subtle music from the ringing tones of Lordship is raining down
Text: This subtle music from the ringing tones of Lordship is raining down.

Sentence: Both at a single breath are from the firmament now raining down
Text: Both at a single breath are from the firmament now raining down.

Sentence: The Age of “He is He” from out Our flowing cup is raining down
Text: The Age of “He is He” from out Our flowing cup is raining down.

Sentence: This cup of honeyed nectar from Our ruby lips is raining down
Text: This cup of honeyed nectar from Our ruby lips is raining down.

Sentence: This wondrous message from the melody of Ṭá’ is raining down
Text: This wondrous message from the melody of Ṭá’ is raining down.

Sentence: Which, merged into a single song, in God’s own voice is raining down
Text: Which, merged into a single song, in God’s own voice is raining down.

Sentence: Behold the blessings of the heart that from His throne are raining down
Text: Behold the blessings of the heart that from His throne are raining down.

Sentence: Behold the glorious hymns that in the purest light are raining down
Text: Behold the glorious hymns that in the purest light are raining down.

Sentence: Behold the sacred rhythms that from Our hand are raining down
Text: Behold the sacred rhythms that from Our hand are raining down.

Sentence: Behold the grace upon the world from Our own presence raining down
Text: Behold the grace upon the world from Our own presence raining down.

Sentence: Behold the crystal draught that from Our brimming cup is raining down
Text: Behold the crystal draught that from Our brimming cup is raining down.

Sentence: Behold the heart of Sinai—from Our hand all raining down
Text: Behold the heart of Sinai—from Our hand all raining down.

Sentence: Behold the bliss that from His presence in your midst is raining down
Text: Behold the bliss that from His presence in your midst is raining down.

Sentence: Behold the Lordly grace that from Our Pen is raining down
Text: Behold the Lordly grace that from Our Pen is raining down.

Sentence: The trill of songbirds this, from Our fleeting Wellspring raining down
Text: The trill of songbirds this, from Our fleeting Wellspring raining down.
